title: Tadej Pogačar Back for Canada as Worlds Hype Takes Off: ‘Anything Else Will Be a Bonus’
content:
Pogačar has won every race he's started in 2024 except for 3rd Milano-Sanremo as his near-perfect season continues: 'I am eager to get back to it now.'

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Back for Canada as Worlds Hype Takes Off: ‘Anything Else Will Be a Bonus’ on Velo.
author: ahood
